name: POACHED EGGS
instructions: Heat water (1 ½ to 2 inches) to boiling; reduce to simmering.  Break each egg into custard cup or saucer; holding cup or saucer close to water’s surface.  Slip 1 egg at a time into water.
Cook until desired doneness, 3 to 5 minutes.  Remove eggs from water with slotted spoon.
